title: Paris Saint-Germain FC - Wikipedia
snippet: Paris Saint-Germain are the most popular football club in France, accounting for 22% of the country's fan base. With an estimated 35 million fans, PSG are also one of the most followed teams in the world. The Parc des Princes has been its home ground since July 1974.

title: Parc des Princes (2025) - All You Need to Know BEFORE You Go (with Reviews)
snippet: First time we visit the Paris Saint-Germain (PSG) football stadium, the tour takes place at the Parc des Princes, Parisâ€™ iconic sports facility located in the Paris district of Paris.

title: Parc des Princes - Wikipedia
snippet: It is located in the southwest of the French capital, within the 16th arrondissement, directly opposite the Stade Jean-Bouin. The stadium, with a seating capacity of 47,929 spectators, has been the home of French football club Paris Saint-Germain FC (PSG) since July 1974.

title: Paris Saint-Germain exploring options for new stadium
snippet: Ligue 1 club Paris Saint-Germain said that it is more determined than ever to leave the Parc des Princes, which it feels it has outgrown, and it is exploring steps toward building a new stadium in the Paris area.

title: Paris Saint-Germain - Stadium - Parc des Princes | Transfermarkt
snippet: In addition to the basic facts, you can find the address of the stadium, access information, special features, prices in the stadium and name rights. The drop-down menu above the basic facts allows you to look at former stadiums (clubs) or other home grounds (national teams).
